alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 8:08PM CDT until July 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Crawford County in west central Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dow City, or 9 miles southwest of Denison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Buck Grove around 820 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Manilla and Aspinwall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
